about

Hi, I’m Nick and this is my world-wide website.

previous work

Between 2006 and 2011, I did a webcomic called Carl Garbanzo.

I contributed comics to Issues 1, 3 and 4 of the Comix Reader.

In 2012 I did the album cover for Western Skies, Eastern Dreams by Brandon Terzic and Ravi Padmanabha.

I’ve also made three self-published comics:

  • Sizemo and Satchmo versus Humanity (2004)
  • The Passionate Intensity of Neil Armstrong (2005)
  • Tales from the Cosmic Mountain (2005)

re-use

If you’d like to use any of these pictures, send me an email.

Blog about work stuff: education, technology and design
